title: Careerado, Find your Career Path and Roadmap
description1: Explore different career paths, discover your passion and get a realistic roadmap on what it's going to take to achieve those career aspirations.
description2: Identify fields you want to pursue to develop long-term objectives, play with them and look out for what works the best for you. Gain insight on the main duties of each profession, the work environment, training requirements, advancement prospects and more. Analyse the information to select appropriate career opportunities when formalizing your Career Roadmap.
